sanitized_description: This template demonstrates personal information phishing: social media account alerts, identity verification requests, and security warnings. Typical patterns include detected suspicious activity and requests for identity confirmation.

placeholders.subject: [SERVICE_NAME] Security Alert
placeholders.preheader: Unusual activity detected on your account
placeholders.body_notes: Alarming tone about security. Mentions suspicious activity or login attempt. Contains urgent verification request for account safety.

training_objectives: Identify social engineering in personal contexts
Practice detecting personal phishing red flags
safety_notes: This is an educational template only
Contains NO real links or actionable content
Should NEVER be used for actual phishing
